hatalskan

Class Exam

  • java.lang.Object
    • hatalskan.Exam

  • public class Exam
extends java.lang.Object
    An Exam represents a single exam made up of student responses, statistics, and a version. It can report any of its fields.

    • Constructor Summary

      • outputExamCSV

        public java.lang.String outputExamCSV(java.io.File outputDir,
                             int[] incorrect)
        Creates a CSV output for the this Exam a the specified output directory
        Parameters:
        outputDir - The output directory to write the files to
        incorrect - The int array with the number of incorrect answers. If null, does not write an incorrect answers section per question
        Returns:
        Returns content of output csv file
